content: brioche infinity scarves seem to be very popular these days at least here in iceland but why buy a commercially made scarf when you can easily knit one this is a very easy fun and quick project and the pattern is free if you can t find the yarns specified i recommend using any 1 ply and/or unspun worsted or aran weight yarn soft merino wool or alpaca is perfect the scarf uses 2 skeins of either linked yarn update the pattern is now available in spanish thanks to hannafcs 1 1 http //www ravelry com/people/hannafcs
